metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34152 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in ImageMagick. This security flaw cause a remote code execution vulnerability in OpenBlob with --enable-pipes configured.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the build option --enable-pipes first appeared in version 6.9.4-6, hence, before bionic the option didn't even exist. upstream claims that the usage of --enable-pipes is a security risk by design. it is not enabled by default in Ubuntu.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
